cms.query.QueryText:
UPDATE [Analytics_ExitPages] SET [ExitPageUrl] = @Url, [ExitPageLastModified] = @Date, [ExitPageSiteID] = @SiteID, [ExitPageCulture] = @Culture WHERE [ExitPageSessionIdentifier] = @SessionID
IF (@@ROWCOUNT = 0) BEGIN INSERT INTO [Analytics_ExitPages] ([ExitPageSessionIdentifier], [ExitPageUrl], [ExitPageLastModified], [ExitPageSiteID], [ExitPageCulture]) VALUES (@SessionID, @Url, @Date, @SiteID, @Culture) END
